about_the_game:
Desvelado is the first Bed-Time-Vania game in history! Help our hero Vampy fight insomnia one last time by turning off every light of the castle. In this 2D precision platformer you will overcome challenging puzzles and enemies before going to sleep in your cosy coffin.

GO BAT TO SLEEP!


Vampy might look cute, but he ain't no kid. He can't go to sleep until all the lights in his castle are off. Unfortunately, these annoying ghosts turn them back on all the time. Your mission is to go through different scenarios, solving puzzles, jumping just in time, dodging enemies and passing through walls, to turn off all the lights and complete the game.

DON'T WORRY, YOU'RE IMMORTAL


Probably you'll die many times playing Desvelado, but don't worry, you can restart in a blink of an eye! Each room has its solution, but sometimes you can find your own!

LUCKILY YOU HAVE POWERS


Vampy has learned a trick or two during his long life. If you consume a red flame, you can dash and turn off that light that seemed too far to reach. But be careful, you can do that once! You'll have to find another red light to do it again. Plan well your movements to solve each puzzle.

DON'T BE SLOW!

Ghosts have sometimes had too much sugary drinks and move quite quickly. You will have to be agile in your movements to be able to overcome them!

THIS IS ALL IN MY CASTLE?


Vampy often gets surprised by the amount of strange but familiar mechanics in the rooms of his abode. As you go deeper you will find more challenges to solve!

And if you're still sleepless, complete the bonus levels to get all the collectibles!

Also: RUN!

Not everything is about jumping and solving puzzles in this castle. On your journey to your precious bed you may have to escape from lurking dangers!

FEATURED IN THIS GAME:

  • Manual control configuration comming soon...
  • Immortal gameplay: Classic 2D platformer mechanics.
  • Sharp controller: Slide, jump and dash to move swiftly.
  • Bloody animations: Enjoy a unique visual style, with hand-crafted animations.
  • Vampiric music to get in the mood.
  • 100+ Rooms to solve.
  • 3 Main zones: The Castle, the Dungeon, and the Catacombs.
  • 3 Final levels: What you learned in each area will be put into play.
  • Bonus Levels: Some rooms are optional, but if you complete them, you'll get an award!
